preference.name: Scp0PartMSDDeclRevision_DefaultChildProperties
preference.preference_description:
Specifies the list of properties that can be used as child properties of the Scp0PartMSDDeclRevision object type.
The format of the preference follows: <TypeName>_DefaultChildProperties=my_property.
The following child properties are available OOTB: IMAN_reference Mat1UsesMaterial Scp0UsesSubstanceCategory Scp0AbstractDeclResponse Scp0PartToSubsCmplResult Scp0SubsCmplDocs Scp0UsesExemption Scp0BOMSnapshot
